title: ||求助！急||Mythicmobs插件报错，高悬赏，求高手帮忙
author: 方块大师
txt_content:
Mythicmobs插件报错了。。。。目标是刷怪点，一创造刷怪点就疯狂报错
下面是报错的信息





[12:42:41 WARN]: [MythicMobs] Task #39 for MythicMobs v2.1.8 generated an exception
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.bukkit.Server.getOnlinePlayers()Ljava/util/Collection;
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicLib.Adapters.Bukkit.BukkitServer.getOnlinePlayers(BukkitServer.java:37) ~[?:?]
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicMobs.Spawners.SpawnerHandler.playerWithinSpawnerRange(SpawnerHandler.java:207) ~[?:?]
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicMobs.Spawners.MythicSpawner.checkSpawnConditions(MythicSpawner.java:424) ~[?:?]
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicMobs.Spawners.MythicSpawner.tickSpawnerClock(MythicSpawner.java:383) ~[?:?]
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicMobs.Spawners.SpawnerHandler.tickSpawnerClocks(SpawnerHandler.java:32) ~[?:?]
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicMobs.Clock.MythicMobsClock.run(MythicMobsClock.java:53) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:53) ~[Start.jar:git-Bukkit-1.7.2-R0.3-b3020jnks]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:345) [Start.jar:git-Bukkit-1.7.2-R0.3-b3020jnks]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.MinecraftServer.u(MinecraftServer.java:587) [Start.jar:git-Bukkit-1.7.2-R0.3-b3020jnks]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.DedicatedServer.u(DedicatedServer.java:250) [Start.jar:git-Bukkit-1.7.2-R0.3-b3020jnks]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.MinecraftServer.t(MinecraftServer.java:545) [Start.jar:git-Bukkit-1.7.2-R0.3-b3020jnks]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:457) [Start.jar:git-Bukkit-1.7.2-R0.3-b3020jnks]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:617) [Start.jar:git-Bukkit-1.7.2-R0.3-b3020jnks]
[12:42:42 WARN]: Exception in thread "pool-3-thread-131" 
[12:42:42 WARN]: org.apache.commons.lang.UnhandledException: Plugin MythicMobs v2.1.8 generated an exception while executing task 40
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R1.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:56)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.bukkit.Server.getOnlinePlayers()Ljava/util/Collection;
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicLib.Adapters.Bukkit.BukkitServer.getOnlinePlayers(BukkitServer.java:37)
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicMobs.Spawners.SpawnerHandler.playerWithinSpawnerRange(SpawnerHandler.java:207)
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicMobs.Spawners.MythicSpawner.tickSpawnerAsyncClock(MythicSpawner.java:321)

        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicMobs.Clock.MythicMobsAsyncClock.run(MythicMobsAsyncClock.java:29)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:53)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R1.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:53)
        ... 3 more



求助！，求帮忙！大问题！

replies.author: zmdoyouknow
replies.txt_content: 插件异步处理的问题吧，MM2.1以上版本采用了异步处理怪物，可能你的服务端不支持，试试用低版本的mm看看会不会出现问题

replies.author: 方块大师
replies.txt_content:
2.0.6也会报错，内容和上面一致
2.0.7 2.0.8好像都会报错。。
